snippet: The country’s deputy nuclear chief said a report that technicians had removed the core of the country’s heavy-water reactor and poured concrete into the cavity was baseless.
abstract: Iranian deputy nuclear chief Ali Asghar Zarean denies report that Arak heavy-water reactor has been dismantled and filled with concrete, saying country plans to sign agreement to modify it.
lead_paragraph: The country’s deputy nuclear chief said a report that technicians had removed the core of the country’s heavy-water reactor and poured concrete into the cavity was baseless.

headline.main: Iranian Official Denies That Nuclear Reactor Was Sealed
headline.print_headline: Iran Official Denies Report That Reactor Is Sealed
